translation.en: [woman over radio] Attention all units, attention all units.
translation.zh: （明尼苏达州阿什湖 十年前） 各单位请注意

translation.en: Probable domestic disturbance with hostage situation.
translation.zh: 这是一起疑似家庭暴力兼软禁案件
代号10-24 有警员倒下了

translation.en: Perp is a Caucasian male, no known priors.
translation.zh: 肇事者是一名白人男性 没有案底

translation.en: Considered extremely dangerous. Proceed with caution.
translation.zh: 被视为极度危险人物 请谨慎处理

translation.en: [man 1 over radio] Unit 16. Suspect is Ray Hutchinson,
translation.zh: 涉嫌人是雷哈钦森 38岁 身高1米88的白人男性 中等身型
涉嫌人是雷哈钦森 38岁 身高1米88的白人男性 中等身型 有一名前妻以及两个孩子

translation.en: [man 2 over radio] We've got three hostages, ex-wife and two kids.
translation.zh: 一共有三名人质 分别是前妻和两名小孩

translation.en: [woman] Suspect is wanted in connection with the murder of a police officer.
translation.zh: 犯疑因为涉及一起警员谋杀案被通缉

translation.en: He should be considered armed and dangerous.
translation.zh: 他携带枪支 被视为危险人物

translation.en: [Ray over phone] I'm not coming out, you hear me? I'm not coming out.
translation.zh: 我是不会出来的 听到吗？ 我不会离开屋子

translation.en: I want everyone gone. You, your men, snipers, everyone.
translation.zh: 我要所有人都撤出这里 你和你的手下以及狙击兵 所有的人

translation.en: If I don't see taillights in the next five minutes,
translation.zh: 我要是在接下来的五分钟内 看不到车子离开

translation.en: you're not gonna like what happens next.
translation.zh: 你们可不会乐意看到 接下来将发生的事

translation.en: Can you get him back on the phone?

translation.zh: 行动 是的 长官

translation.en: [commander over radio] Gold Unit, this is HR1. Move to green.
translation.zh: 黄金单位 这里是HR一号 批准前进
联邦调查局！把手举起来！
我瞄准他了 老大 本 不行 他没有携带武器
本 不行 他没有携带武器

translation.en: I didn't want it to end like this.
It's not supposed to end like this.
Put your son down and step away.
translation.zh: 把你的儿子放下再后退

translation.en: [pilot] Command, this is Navy Alpha two-one-niner
translation.zh: 指挥中心 这里是海军阿尔法219单位

translation.en: en route to Beaufort Naval Hospital.
translation.zh: 指挥中心 这里是海军阿尔法219单位 我们正前往博福特海军医院

translation.en: [woman over PA] Dr. McCullen, Surgery, please.

translation.zh: 他准备好了 海军上尉

translation.en: [newsman] From the Great Pyramid of Giza to the Tower of Babel,
translation.zh: 从吉萨金字塔到巴比伦塔

translation.en: brick by brick and stone by stone,
mankind has been consumed by one singular desire,
translation.zh: 人类已被单一的欲望所吞噬
我们最终或许真的办到了

translation.en: [newsman 2] The brainchild of former tech magnate, Zhao Long Ji.
translation.zh: 前科技巨头赵龙基的心血结晶

translation.en: -[woman] Zhao Long Ji. -[man] Zhao Long Ji.
translation.zh: （亚罗德工业评论 赵龙基）
富有远见的企业家 赵龙基

translation.en: [newsman] Who has spared no expense creating this city in the sky,
translation.zh: 不惜代价创造在天空中的这座城市

translation.en: going so far as to build a 30-story vertical park at the building's center.
translation.zh: 甚至在建筑中心 建立一个30层楼高的垂直公园

translation.en: The Pearl speaks to what we can achieve when we don't accept limitations.
translation.zh: 明珠塔证实了 我们不接受限制时可以达成的目标
这不是一栋平凡的大楼…
这是地球上最高的建筑物

translation.en: [newsman] This high-tech high-rise generates all of its energy needs
translation.zh: 这栋有高端科技的高楼通过顶楼的 一个巨大双螺旋风力涡轮机…

translation.en: from a massive double helix wind turbine near its top.
translation.zh: 来产生所有的能源需求

translation.en: [newswoman] Dwarfing the Burj Khalifa and tripling the height
translation.zh: 哈利法塔相比之下显得矮小… 这栋大楼也是历史悠久的 帝国大厦三倍的高度…

translation.en: of the venerable Empire State Building.
translation.zh: 这栋大楼也是历史悠久的 帝国大厦三倍的高度…

translation.en: [newswoman] The Pearl's lower half has delighted the public for six months.
translation.zh: 明珠塔的下部楼层 已经让大众兴奋了半年之久…

translation.en: [newsman 4] Its residential upper half has yet to open its doors.
translation.zh: 上部楼层的住宅区尚未开放…
社会是由一栋栋的大楼塑造出的
有更优秀的的大楼… …就能塑造出更优质的城市

translation.en: [newswoman 2] But it's the mysterious sphere that has the world buzzing.
translation.zh: 让全世界侃侃而谈的 是大楼的神秘球体建筑
在今天发布的声明中 这位隐秘的亿万富翁证实了

translation.en: the secretive billionaire confirmed that despite rumors
translation.zh: 在今天发布的声明中 这位隐秘的亿万富翁证实了 尽管外界传言如此庞大尺寸的结构 无法被成功支撑

translation.en: of an inability to fully insure a structure this size,
translation.zh: 尽管外界传言如此庞大尺寸的结构 无法被成功支撑

translation.en: plans to open the building's upper half remain on track.
translation.zh: 开放大楼上部楼层的计划将如期进行

translation.en: [newswoman 3] He promises that the sphere will be
translation.zh: 他也保证大楼的球体建筑…

translation.en: the number one tourist attraction in the world, with views of Hong Kong...
translation.zh: 将成为世界头号旅游景点 在那里可以遥望到香港的景色…

translation.en: The screens go off, shoes go on. It's panda time.
translation.zh: 关上电视 穿好鞋子 是时候去看熊猫了！

translation.en: Where's your dad? I need him to fix my phone before we go.
translation.zh: 你爸爸呢？ 我得在出发前请他修好我的手机

translation.en: Ah, screw it. I'm just gonna high-five the guy.
translation.zh: 管他的 我跟那家伙击掌问好就行了

translation.en: Yeah. -Yeah, just some leg stuff, you know. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 是的 只是有些腿部上的困扰

translation.en: Does it look like I'm trying too hard?
translation.zh: 我看上去不会用力过猛吗？
不会 这个穿着是表示敬意

translation.en: No, but you should learn to tie one. Come here.
translation.zh: 不 但你应该学会如何打领带 过来吧

translation.en: I can hear your gears turning.
translation.zh: 我看得出你在胡思乱想

translation.en: I just don't want to screw it up, you know.
translation.zh: 我只是不想把事情搞砸 你懂的

translation.en: You're not gonna screw it up.
I don't know. What if I missed something?
translation.zh: 那很难说 万一我遗漏掉某个细节呢？

translation.en: Baby, there's no way you've missed something.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你是不可能会错过任何细节的

translation.en: You've been preparing for this meeting for six months.
translation.zh: 你为这次会面已经准备了半年时间

translation.en: I've never seen you work harder on anything.
translation.zh: 我从没见过你如此用心
你已做好万全的准备了

translation.en: You know this place better than the architect. You're gonna do great.
translation.zh: 你比建筑师更了解这里 你一定会有出色的表现

translation.en: They flew you out here for a reason. They want to hear what you have to say.
translation.zh: 他们特地邀你来就是想听你的看法

translation.en: Ben stuck his neck out for me and then, you know,
translation.zh: 本为了帮我已经耗上了他的一切

translation.en: this could be a real game-changer for us.
translation.zh: 这或许能够改变我们的现况

translation.en: They give stuff like this to big companies. I work out of our garage.
translation.zh: 这种工程通常都会交给大公司 我只是在自家车库营业的小公司
是的 但那是一个很不错的车库

translation.en: Okay, look, just because you're a smaller company
translation.zh: 听着 就因为你是较小规模的公司…

translation.en: does not mean that you don't belong
Ben stuck his neck out for you because he's your friend
translation.zh: 本之所以会为你两肋插刀 是因为他是你朋友…
朋友之间是应该这么做的

translation.en: Hey. Look at me. Look at me.
"Hey, look at me, you've got this, you look so handsome,"
translation.zh: “嘿 看着我 你行的 你非常英俊…”

translation.en: just a way of buttering me up to fix your phone again?
translation.zh: 都只是为了讨好我再次帮你修手机？

translation.en: All right, well, what do I tell you to do any time something's wrong with your phone?
translation.zh: 每当你的手机出现问题时 我都教你要怎么做？

translation.en: Try turning it off and on again. [Will] Try turning it off and on again.
translation.zh: -尝试关机后再开机 -尝试关机后再开机

translation.en: 90% of the time, you can fix a problem by turning it off and on again.
translation.zh: 百分之九十的问题 都能通过关机后再开机来解决

translation.en: So, did you, uh, try turning it off and on again?
Nope. I like it better when you do it. It gives you a sense of accomplishment.
translation.zh: 没有 我比较喜欢由你来做 那会让你有成就感

translation.en: Oh, I see. So you're asking me to fix your phone for me?
translation.zh: 原来是这样 你是想要我帮你修好手机？

translation.en: Put your coats in your bags.
[Will] All right, kids. You guys are gonna go see pandas.
translation.zh: 好的 孩子们 你们要去看熊猫了！

translation.en: -[Sarah gasps] Pandas. -Daddy's gonna go make that bacon.
translation.zh: 爸爸也要去努力赚钱了

translation.en: -[children laugh] -Let me ask you a question.
-Can't hear you. Can't hear you. -[both] Me! Me!

translation.zh: 你充满自信 你还不够自信

translation.en: Okay, okay, you know what? You're both right.
translation.zh: 好吧 你们知道吗？ 你们两人都答对了 因为…
好吧 你们知道吗？ 你们两人都答对了 因为… 爸爸爱你们两人

translation.en: [Sarah] I got to get a chant.

translation.zh: 萨拉 你看上去美丽极了

translation.en: Mmm, thank you. It's so good to see you.
You're kidding me. These are the twins?
translation.zh: -可不是？ -开什么玩笑？这是双胞胎？

translation.en: They're so big now. What are you guys up to?
translation.zh: 都长这么大了 你们好啊？

translation.en: -We're going to see the pandas. -I heard.
translation.zh: -我们正要去看熊猫 -我听说了

translation.en: This'll get you in to see the nighttime panda feeding.
translation.zh: 这能让你们参与熊猫的夜间喂食…

translation.en: -Thank you. -But I know a lot of pandas, so.
translation.zh: 谢谢你！ 我认识很多熊猫 所以…
我认识很多熊猫 所以…

translation.en: Some gear, just to look the part.
translation.zh: 拿去吧 穿上配备来融入环境

translation.en: -[Sarah] What do you guys say? -[both] Thank you.
Get out of here, go have fun. I'll see you tonight, honey.
translation.zh: 走吧 玩的开心 晚上见了 亲爱的

translation.en: What's up? Good to see you.
Hey, look. Thanks for putting in a good word.
translation.zh: 嘿 听我说 谢谢你的美言 我知道我公司的规模 对这庞大的工程来说…
谢谢你的美言 我知道我公司的规模 对这庞大的工程来说…

translation.en: They're dying to open the upper half.
translation.zh: 他们迫不及待想要开放上部楼层

translation.en: And they needed somebody to check the math on their safety and security systems.
translation.zh: 需要有人检查安全措施 并确认保安系统一切操作正常

translation.en: Plus, you were cheaper than anyone else.
translation.zh: 再说 你的收费比其他人都来的便宜
还是便宜很多 简直像是半价
真是低调嘛？ 没错 用固体钛打造

translation.en: Nothing says, "Welcome to my penthouse panic room"
translation.zh: 这25厘米厚的军用等级 超耐热合金材料…

translation.en: like 10 inches of military-grade super alloy.
translation.zh: 简直就在宣告 “欢迎来到我的顶楼安全屋…”
准备好会见这位巫师了吗？

translation.en: I mean... [exhales] I guess if you got to live somewhere...
It's a pleasure to finally meet you.
Thank God. My wife only taught me one phrase.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 我太太只教会我一句中文

translation.en: Sarah, right? She's a Naval surgeon, isn't she?
translation.zh: 萨拉 对吗？ 她是一名海军外科医生吧？

translation.en: She is. She also minored in language and East Asian studies
translation.zh: 是的 她也曾在安纳波利斯 修读过东亚语言及研究

translation.en: -at Annapolis. -And your twins, Henry and Georgia.
translation.zh: 是的 她也曾在安纳波利斯 修读过东亚语言及研究 还有你的双胞胎儿女 亨利还有佐吉亚？
你对一切事物了如指掌

translation.en: You are the very first family we have had in the residential section of The Pearl.
translation.zh: 你们是入住 明珠塔住宅区的第一个家庭

translation.en: I thought it might be a good test for us.
translation.zh: 这也可以当作我们测试的好机会

translation.en: It's their first visit to Hong Kong.
translation.zh: 这是他们首次的香港之旅

translation.en: Ah, here they are. Allow me to introduce my head of personal security,
translation.zh: 他们来了 容许我介绍 我的私人保安队负责人…
亚扎尼欧科克 以及来自霍桑斯通保险集团的…

translation.en: -Very nice to meet you, Mr. Sawyer. -Likewise.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你 索亚先生 -我也是

translation.en: After your independent third-party assessment is approved,
translation.zh: 得到你的独立第三方评估批准后

translation.en: they will confirm full coverage of The Pearl,
translation.zh: 他们会确认 明珠塔拥有全方位的覆盖

translation.en: which I'm told will carry the most expensive premium
translation.zh: 据我了解 这将是承保历史上

translation.en: for a single structure in underwriting history.
translation.zh: 首次为单一建筑物 投下最昂贵的保险金额

translation.en: employ a one-of-a-kind self-sealing ventilation system
translation.zh: 采用的是独一无二的 自密封式通风系统

translation.en: and a robust sprinkler and CO2 array
translation.zh: 通过强大喷口释放出二氧化碳 这样的阵列

translation.en: which can put out a fire in a fraction of the time.
translation.zh: 通过强大喷口释放出二氧化碳 这样的阵列 可以在一瞬间将火势扑灭

translation.en: All monitored by a control facility located over a mile away.
translation.zh: 由位于一公里多外的控制台全程监控 （位于安全地点的场外设施）

translation.en: You hired me to assess your safety and security systems
translation.zh: 你聘请我来评估 这里的安全和保安系统

translation.en: and after a complete analysis, I can say that it's the safest
translation.zh: 经过完整的分析后 我可以证实 这是全世界最安全的超高结构
我可以证实 这是全世界最安全的超高结构

translation.en: It's Fort Knox, a mile in the sky.
translation.zh: 这就像是在天空中的诺克斯堡

translation.en: Once I inspect the security at the off-site facility,
translation.zh: 我一旦检查过场外设施的安全性
我的工作就告一个段落

translation.en: and you can open the residential upper half.
translation.zh: 你将能开放上部楼层的住宅区

translation.en: You were the right man for the job.
translation.zh: 你确实是这份工程的不二人选

translation.en: This tablet will give you administrative access
translation.zh: 这台平板电脑会给予你管理员权限

translation.en: to The Pearl's fire and safety control measures.
translation.zh: 能操控明珠塔的防火及安全控制措施

translation.en: Once linked to your biometric data,
translation.zh: 一旦连接上你的生物识别数据

translation.en: you'll be the only one who can access it.
translation.zh: 你将是唯一可以接触这些资料的人

translation.en: Ben will take you to our off-site facility
translation.zh: 本会带你到我们的场外设施

translation.en: so you can make sure everything checks out.
translation.zh: 好让你能检查一切是否操作正常 （威尔索亚 脸部配对完成）

translation.en: [Zhao] If we hurry, there's still time.
translation.zh: 我们要是赶紧出发 应该还来得及

translation.en: Three hundred and seventeen motion-sensitive projection panels
make this sphere the eighth wonder of the world.
translation.zh: 将让这个球体成为世界第八大奇观
在这里 任何事都是有可能的

translation.en: The sphere is comprised of nearly 25,000 ultra high-definition panels
translation.zh: 这个球体包括了 近25000超高分辨率面板

translation.en: with embedded 8K micro cameras on both sides.
translation.zh: 在双面都配有 嵌入式的8K微型摄像头
欢迎来到天堂 索亚先生
他真的这么说？ 是的

translation.en: -But, like, cool or creepy? -Uh, little of both.
translation.zh: 是用酷炫或诡异的语气？ 两者兼有吧
天啊 有钱人花样真多

translation.en: Yeah, but things are a lot different now. I got a wife and kids,
translation.zh: 但如今人事已非 我有妻子和孩子…

translation.en: and I haven't touched a gun in 10 years.
translation.zh: 也有十年没有碰过枪了

translation.en: I just kind of put my sword down, you know?
and I'm just never gonna pick it up again.

translation.zh: 别这样 他并没有携带武器

translation.en: You know, he was wearing a vest. There's no way you could've known that.
translation.zh: 但你根本无法看出 他穿着装有炸药的背心
那只不过是运气不好罢了

translation.en: You know, the funny thing is, without that bad luck, I, uh...
translation.zh: 但有趣的是 若没有那次的厄运…

translation.en: I never would've had my kids.
I don't know who I'd be without my family.
translation.zh: 要是没有我的家人 我真不知道自己会如何
我肯定会感到很迷惑 就像是… 我

translation.en: Come on, man, I'm sorry. I didn't mean it like that.
translation.zh: 别这样 本 抱歉 我不是这个意思
放轻松 我只是在开玩笑

translation.en: [Will] The kids are really excited about the nighttime feeding.
translation.zh: 孩子们对于夜间喂食感到很兴奋

translation.en: [Ben] Yeah, it's a blast. They'll be there all night.
translation.zh: 是的 那确实很有趣 他们一整晚都会在那里

translation.en: -Thanks for taking me to the off-site. -No worries.
translation.zh: 谢谢你带我来参观场外设施 不客气

translation.en: I mean, dinner's on you, of course.

translation.zh: -他抢走了我的手提袋！ -我去追！
天啊 -那看起来不太妙 -是的
-那看起来不太妙 -是的 我们去清理伤口吧？
这感觉似曾相识 没错

translation.en: You're gonna need some stitches for that, though, man. That's a nasty cut, bro.
translation.zh: 你需要缝几针 伤口很深

translation.en: Yeah, I put it in my jacket before we left.
translation.zh: 是的 我在离开前放进外套里

translation.en: -How's that for luck, huh? -Yeah, man. Nice one.
translation.zh: 真是幸运吧？ 的确是

translation.en: Thought we were both gonna get fired for that.
translation.zh: 我还以为我们两人会就此被解雇

translation.en: Well, we didn't really get to see them
because Henry ate a weird candy and started throwing up,
translation.zh: 亨利吃了一颗奇怪的糖果 接着开始呕吐

translation.en: Is he okay? Did he have an attack?
translation.zh: 他没事吧？ 他的哮喘病有发作吗？
没有 他的呼吸顺畅
但是 你知道的 看不到熊猫
-真是逊透了 -逊透了！ 别说“逊透了”亲爱的

translation.en: I'll take you there tomorrow, okay, if you're feeling better.
translation.zh: 你要是感觉好多了 我明天带你们去 好吗？
哦 抱歉 小姐 正在进行大楼维修

translation.en: We thought this floor was empty.
translation.zh: 我们以为这层楼是空着的
我也这么以为 一切没事吧？
我也这么以为 一切没事吧？ 一切都没事

translation.en: We're just checking the phone lines.
translation.zh: 我们只是在检查电话线

translation.en: I didn't know they were active yet.
translation.zh: 我不知道电话线连接好了

translation.en: Well, they will be when we finish with them.
translation.zh: 我们一检查完便可以使用

translation.en: Well, look at this precious little pair.
You got the run of the castle on this floor.
translation.zh: 你们在这层楼可以自由玩耍

translation.en: Not too bad for a big strong knight
translation.zh: 这听起来很不错 对一名强大的骑士
以及一位漂亮的小公主而言

translation.en: They were supposed to be gone.
translation.zh: 他们应该早就离开这里了

translation.en: -I know. -Want me to clean that up?
translation.zh: 我知道 要我来处理吗？
这里到时候会统统被解决掉

translation.en: -What's up? Where you going? -I got to go.
translation.zh: -你做什么 要去哪？ -我得走了

translation.en: Henry's not feeling well. They went back to The Pearl.
translation.zh: 亨利感到不舒服 他们回到明珠塔了

translation.en: All right. I'll call you tonight. What a day, huh?
translation.zh: 我今晚再打给你 真是漫长的一天吧？

translation.en: You're not gonna make it in time.
Why'd you take it out of the bag?
translation.zh: 你为何要从手提袋里拿出？

translation.en: You should've just left it in the bag.
translation.zh: 你应该把那个留在袋子里的

translation.en: Ben, what are you talking about?

translation.zh: 威尔 把平板电脑给我
-到底发生了什么事？ -发生了什么事？

translation.en: You screw up, you get a whole new life.
translation.zh: 你在搞砸后却重获新生 但我呢？

translation.en: What do I get? Hmm? Medical discharge?
translation.zh: 你在搞砸后却重获新生 但我呢？ 因为健康原因退伍

translation.en: You don't know these people, Will.
translation.zh: 你不知道这帮人的能耐 威尔
我知道你内心备受煎熬 兄弟

translation.en: but you don't want to do this.
Let's get you up. Come on, let's go. Sit up. There we go.
translation.zh: 我把你扶起来 坐好

translation.en: Hold this here. Hold it tight.
I need you to tell me what happened, okay?
translation.zh: 我需要你把所有事都告诉我 好吗？

translation.en: All right? I can help you if you tell me what happened.
translation.zh: 你得把事情告诉我 我才能够帮你

translation.en: They weren't supposed to go back, Will.
translation.zh: 他们不该回到那里的 威尔

translation.en: They weren't supposed to be there.
translation.zh: 他们根本不该出现在那里

translation.en: Who wasn't supposed to be there?
Light a man's house on fire
and you find out what he truly loves.
translation.zh: 就能看出他真正爱的是什么
请前往临时就地避难所

translation.en: -Mom? What's going on? -[alarm wailing in distance]
translation.zh: 妈妈 发生什么事了？

translation.en: I don't know. Let me go check.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我去查看
请前往临时就地避难所
（火警 第96楼层） 启动防火措施
我们是否该疏散这栋大楼？
是的 乘坐你的直升机离开

translation.en: The building isn't on fire. The 96th floor is on fire.
translation.zh: 大楼并没有着火 只是第96楼层着火

translation.en: We're more than a hundred stories above that,
translation.zh: 我们离那里超过一百多层楼之上…

translation.en: and the anti-fire measures will keep it there.
translation.zh: 防火设施也会把火势控制住

translation.en: We're perfectly safe here, I assure you.
translation.zh: 我们在这里十分安全 我可以向你保证
他们想要得到平板电脑

translation.en: They're coming, Will. They're gonna kill you.
translation.zh: 他们就快赶来了 威尔 他们会杀掉你
第96楼层的火势已被控制住

translation.en: We're evacuating the floors below the fire line.
translation.zh: 我们正在疏散大楼里面的所有人 大概需要一个小时

translation.en: What about the people above the 96th?
translation.zh: 在第96楼层之上的那些人呢？

translation.en: The owner is in the penthouse on the 220th.
But the fire will never get there.
translation.zh: 但火势是不会扩延至那里的

translation.en: What about the people on other floors?
translation.zh: 在其他楼层的人呢？他们怎么样？

translation.en: There's no one else above the 96th.
translation.zh: 在第96楼层之上 除了业主没有别人
好的 你们快到浴室去

translation.en: [automated voice] Shelter in place. Come on.
translation.zh: -请前往临时就地避难所 -来吧

translation.en: -Come here, bud. -I'm fine, Mom. I don't need it.
translation.zh: 过来吧 小子 我没事的 妈妈 我不需要

translation.en: You're fine now, honey, but we're about to go out there,
translation.zh: 你现在没事 亲爱的 但我们一旦出到外头

translation.en: and there's a lot of smoke and a lot of bad air,
translation.zh: 那里的空气被污染也有很多浓烟

translation.en: and we don't want you to have an attack, okay?
translation.zh: 我只是不想你的哮喘病发作 好吗？

translation.en: Georgia, dunk them all the way. Make sure they get completely wet,
translation.zh: 佐吉亚 浸泡至完全湿透
不会的 宝贝 我们不会死

translation.en: Baby, we are not gonna die. We are gonna be just fine.
translation.zh: 不会的 宝贝 我们不会死 我们会没事的

translation.en: [Xia over radio] We're in position at the off-site control facility.
translation.zh: 我们操控了场外设施的控制台

translation.en: There you are. Baby, there's a fire in the building.
translation.zh: 你打来了 亲爱的 大楼发生火灾了

translation.en: I know. All right, look, I can't get to you.
translation.zh: 我知道 听我说 我无法来到你身边

translation.en: The police have the entire building locked down.
translation.zh: 警察已经封锁了整栋大楼

translation.en: I want you to get out of there right now.
Go inside the hallway, there should be a logistics panel.
translation.zh: 到走廊上 那里应该有一个流程面板

translation.en: If you show it to me, I can tell you where it's safe to go.
translation.zh: 你若能给我看那个 我就能告诉你安全的位置

translation.en: Take the kids with you. I'm gonna stay on the phone.
translation.zh: 带着孩子们去 我会留在线上

translation.en: Hand me those towels. Come on.
translation.zh: 把手巾给我 来吧 亲爱的

translation.en: Will Sawyer's family unlocked their apartment door an hour ago.
translation.zh: 威尔索亚的家人 在一小时前把大门解锁

translation.en: They're in the building. Send two men.
translation.zh: 他们仍在大楼内 派两个人去

translation.en: Use the manual override code on the elevators.
translation.zh: 使用电梯系统的手动覆盖代码
把他们带来这里 是 先生

translation.en: [Mr. Pierce] What? Listen, the fire isn't just gonna go out.
translation.zh: 什么？ 听着 火势不会被熄灭

translation.en: I can only access nominal control.
translation.zh: 我只可以在表面上登入控制系统

translation.en: I can't lock out the on-site functions without the...
translation.zh: 我无法废除现场的操作功能…

translation.en: The entire system has been compromised.
What do you mean, you're locked out? I thought that couldn't happen.
translation.zh: 你这是什么意思？ 我以为你不可能被限制登入

translation.en: [Xia over radio] We have full control of the anti-fire systems.
translation.zh: 我们完全操控了防火系统

translation.en: Seal all the fire doors from 95 to the ground.
translation.zh: 封起所有的逃生门 从第95楼层一路到底层

translation.en: And disable all anti-fire measures from 96 to the top.
translation.zh: 也把第96楼层 直通顶楼的防火措施废除

translation.en: [Will over phone] Everything's gonna be okay.
The logistics panel should be to your left.
translation.zh: 流程面板应该在你的左方

translation.en: All the floors above us are yellow.
translation.zh: 在我们上方的楼层都显示了黄色的灯 这是什么意思？

translation.en: -What does that mean? -It means the entire fire system
translation.zh: 在我们上方的楼层都显示了黄色的灯 这是什么意思？ 在你上方楼层的整套防火设施系统 已经失效了
在你上方楼层的整套防火设施系统 已经失效了

translation.en: Sarah, listen to me. The fire is not gonna stop.
translation.zh: 萨拉 听我说 火势是不会熄灭的 我需要你们立即离开那里

translation.en: I want you to get out of there right now and go up.
translation.zh: 火势是不会熄灭的 我需要你们立即离开那里 往上前进 继续走 不要停下来

translation.en: Go up, keep going up, don't stop, don't look back.
translation.zh: 往上前进 继续走 不要停下来 -不要回头看 -好的

translation.en: [Botha over radio] Now force the fire up.
Open the elevator shaft air vents
translation.zh: 打开电梯内的井通风孔

translation.en: and feed it with fresh oxygen.
I give you a $6.5 billion chimney.
translation.zh: 为各位呈现价值65亿的烟囱
什么状况？ 报告现况

translation.en: No one could survive that. They're gone.
translation.zh: 没有人能撑过那个 他们全都死了

translation.en: [Botha] We're moving into position. You know what to do next.
translation.zh: 各就各位 你们知道接下来该怎么做

translation.en: -[Sarah] Go, hurry, up the stairs. -[Will] Sarah.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.
My family's inside. Listen to me.
translation.zh: 我的家人还在里头 听我说

translation.en: I have to get to them.
So, you have full systems control from the tablet.
translation.zh: 你现在可以 通过平板电脑控制整个系统
无需再用到面部识别功能

translation.en: All other access points to The Pearl mainframe have been encrypted.
translation.zh: 明珠塔主要系统的 其他登入点已被加密

translation.en: The entire building now, it's locked out.
translation.zh: 整栋大楼的系统操控已被限制

translation.en: I used my own logarithmic base cipher to encrypt it,
translation.zh: 我采用自己的对数基密码来加密

translation.en: so I am literally the only human on the planet Earth that can crack this.
translation.zh: 我是这个地球上唯一能破解的人

translation.en: [Ajani] If the fire continues to climb,
it will superheat the air around the helipad, making liftoff impossible.
translation.zh: 会导致直升机停机坪周围的空气过热 我们将无法升空

translation.en: Our departure window is closing, sir.
translation.zh: 我们最佳的起飞时段 就快结束了 先生

translation.en: I hate to say it, but it is now or never.
translation.zh: 我很不愿这么说 但我们现在不走就走不了

translation.en: Happy? You got to play the hero,
translation.zh: 你满意了？ 你尝试当英雄的救人计划失败了 我们是时候离开

translation.en: it didn't work, it's time to go.
translation.zh: 你尝试当英雄的救人计划失败了 我们是时候离开

translation.en: [Zhao] All right, Mr. Pierce. You'll get your wish.
translation.zh: 好吧 皮耶斯先生 你如愿以偿了

translation.en: [in Cantonese] What do we know about Sawyer?
translation.zh: 我们对索亚有什么认知？
前海军特种部队 曾获得铜星勋章

translation.en: FBI for six years, Hostage Rescue for eight.
translation.zh: 前海军特种部队 曾获得铜星勋章 在联邦调查局服务过六年 也做了八年的人质救援人员
他妻子是一名作战外科医生
曾三次被派往阿富汗部署

translation.en: Don't have a location on them yet.
translation.zh: 还未查到他们此刻的位置

translation.en: Will Sawyer was hired as a safety assessor.
translation.zh: 威尔索亚被聘请来担任安全评估员 他能够接触到大楼的安全协议

translation.en: He had access to the security protocols.
translation.zh: 他能够接触到大楼的安全协议

translation.en: Maybe he shut down the anti-fire measures.
translation.zh: 防火设施或许是他关闭的

translation.en: Do me a favor, go find Will Sawyer.
translation.zh: 帮我个忙 把威尔索亚找来

translation.en: I'd like to ask him some questions.

translation.zh: 不用了 我找到他了

translation.en: I want to talk to him. [in English] Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -我要跟他谈一谈 -是 长官
电梯被锁上了！ 动作快！

translation.en: What the hell is he doing?
He's climbing above the fire line.
Sir, I can't protect you if you don't tell me what's going on.
translation.zh: 先生… 你若不告诉我实况 我是无法保护你的

translation.en: This isn't just a fire. It's a plot.
translation.zh: 这不像是单纯的火灾 更像是一场阴谋

translation.en: -I can't say for sure. -I don't need facts.
translation.zh: 但我无法确定 我不需要真凭实据

translation.en: What is your gut telling you? Who's behind this?
translation.zh: 你的直觉告诉你什么？ 谁是幕后策划者？

translation.en: If a man like Botha wanted you dead, there are easier ways.
translation.zh: 波塔要是想让你死 会用更简单的方式

translation.en: [scoffs] He doesn't want me dead. At least not yet.
translation.zh: 他不想要我死 至少现在还不是时候

translation.en: And lighting The Pearl on fire is the only way he can get it.
translation.zh: 让明珠塔着火 是他唯一可以得手的方法

translation.en: Is there something I should know?
translation.zh: 有什么是我应该要知道的吗？
是的 直升机准备好了
-把手举起来！ -好的 别开枪

translation.en: [in Cantonese] Why would anyone want to get into a burning building?
translation.zh: 为何会有人想要 进入一栋燃烧的大楼？

translation.en: [in Cantonese] Inspector... We have a last known location
translation.zh: 督察… 我们获知威尔索亚家人 最后出现的位置了
我们获知威尔索亚家人 最后出现的位置了

translation.en: You're doing great. Wait, hold on. Come here.
translation.zh: 你们做得很好 等等 过来这里

translation.en: -Baby, we're gonna wet these again, okay? -Okay, Mommy.
translation.zh: 宝贝 我们得 再次把这个弄湿 好吗？ 好的

translation.en: Okay, baby. Calm down. Calm down.
translation.zh: 好的 亨利 冷静下来 放轻松
那是大火在燃烧 宝贝

translation.en: Where are we gonna go? I don't know.
That's the bridge to the waterfall. We'll keep heading up.
translation.zh: 那是通往瀑布的桥 我们继续往前走

translation.en: Come on. Up the stairs. Okay.

translation.zh: 这不是我们的驾驶员 波塔

translation.en: I see you met my associate.
translation.zh: 看来你见过我的合伙人了

translation.en: Why don't you just shoot me and take it?
translation.zh: 你为何不直接开枪射死我 再夺走你要的？

translation.en: You know I can't do that. 'Cause the men I work for will kill me
translation.zh: 我不能那么做 再说 我若不能成功夺取那东西…

translation.en: if I don't get it back for them.
translation.zh: 雇佣我的那帮人会把我杀了

translation.en: You should've paid me and been done with it. But no.
translation.zh: 你当初应该用钱来打发我 但你偏偏不要

translation.en: Clever boys like you always think you can be clever.
translation.zh: 像你这种聪明人 总以为自己是最聪明的
像我这么做才算聪明吧？

translation.en: I'm gonna take you and your drive
translation.zh: 我接着会带走你 和你的驱动器

translation.en: And I'm going to make you watch as your building burns to ash
translation.zh: 我要你眼睁睁 看着自己的大楼烧成灰烬

translation.en: and there's nothing you can do about it.
He sealed himself in the penthouse. Open the doors.
translation.zh: 他把自己封锁在顶楼 把门打开

translation.en: The penthouse floor has its own subroutine.
translation.zh: （香港） 顶楼有独立的副程序系统

translation.en: Zhao must have isolated that system.
translation.zh: 赵肯定隔离了那套系统 （顶楼 禁止登入）

translation.en: I can't open the doors with this tablet.
translation.zh: 我无法用平板电脑把门打开

translation.en: Wait. It looks like Will Sawyer's in the building.
translation.zh: 等等 看来威尔索亚已经进入了大楼…

translation.en: And I've got a movement alert.
You're not gonna get in using force.
You need someone who knows the system.
translation.zh: 我们需要一个熟悉这套系统的人

translation.en: And I know just the man for the job.
If anyone can get in, it's him.
translation.zh: 若有人能进入 那就是他

translation.en: He's in the building. Just need to find him.
translation.zh: 他在大楼内 我们只需找到他

translation.en: We don't need to find him.

translation.zh: 我们知道他想要的是什么

translation.en: If you can't fix it with duct tape...
translation.zh: 用胶带也解决不了的问题…

translation.en: Then you ain't using enough duct tape.
translation.zh: 只意味着你用的胶带不够多

translation.en: All right, you were on the 98th floor, east side stairwell.
translation.zh: (管理员权限 登入) 好的 你们之前在第98楼层… 东边的楼梯…

translation.en: Means you would've had to go through the park.
translation.zh: （翡翠公园 第100楼层） …你们必须穿过公园
撑着 我会找到你们的

translation.en: -Stay with me, baby. Okay? Okay. -[Henry coughing]
translation.zh: 保持清醒 宝贝 好吗？
来吧 我们就快到了

translation.en: I got them. They're in the park.
translation.zh: 我找到了 他们在公园里

translation.en: -Kids, too. -[Sarah] Do what he says. Okay?
translation.zh: -跟我走 小孩也一起走！ -照着他的话做 好吗？

translation.en: That's right. Listen to your mummy.
translation.zh: 没错　听你们母亲的话吧

translation.en: [Sarah] It's okay, guys. Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 没事的 一切都会没事的…

translation.en: Just do exactly what I say.
Just have to go up a little bit farther.
Keep going. Go all the way up to the waterfall.
translation.zh: 继续走 去到瀑布那里…

translation.en: I'll go around to the other side.

translation.zh: 我们在那里会合 好的

translation.en: [Mr. Pierce] I'm not supposed to kill you,
but I think your kids will be enough.
translation.zh: 但有你的孩子就已足够了
-你没事吧？ -我没事 过来这里

translation.en: How did you get in the building?
It's a long story. Where are the kids?
translation.zh: 说来话长 孩子们呢？

translation.en: -Mom! Dad! -[Sarah] Oh, God, are you okay?
translation.zh: 妈妈！爸爸！ 天啊 你没事吧？
-站住别动 好吗？ -你姐姐呢？

translation.en: She's at the top of the park by the waterfall.
translation.zh: 她在公园的上方 瀑布那里
亲爱的 留在那里！爸爸会来救你！

translation.en: -How do we get across the bridge? -[coughing]
-All right, we got to do this together. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好的 我们必须一同这么做 -好的

translation.en: When I tell you to, walk it out, drop it, and go get him, okay?
translation.zh: 当我示意你时 你往前 把板子放开去抓住他 知道吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna hold the bridge steady.
Oh, I got you. I got you.
-Okay. As still as you can. -[board creaking]
[straining] You can do it. You can do it.
I can't hold it anymore! Jump!
translation.zh: 我快支撑不住了 快跳！

translation.en: Come on. Will, what the hell is going on?
translation.zh: 来吧 威尔 这到底是怎么一回事？

translation.en: I don't know, but I got to get you guys out of this building.
translation.zh: 我不知道 但我会把你们 救出这栋大楼 亨利呼吸困难
我不知道 但我会把你们 救出这栋大楼 亨利呼吸困难 我知道
佐吉亚 我立刻就到你那里！

translation.en: All right, these elevators operate on electromagnetic induction.
translation.zh: 电梯是用电磁感应操作的

translation.en: they're held in place by a fail-safe brake.
translation.zh: 它们会通过故障保护制动器进行固定

translation.en: When I cut this cable, you're gonna fall.
translation.zh: 我一旦切断这条电线 你们就会坠落

translation.en: Just listen to me. You're gonna fall through the fire.
translation.zh: 听我说 你们会在火中坠落

translation.en: The magnets are gonna kick back on
once you pass the fire line.
But I need you to pull this handle in order to engage the braking system.
translation.zh: 我需要你拉这个把手 以便接合制动系统

translation.en: It's about 500 feet from here until the fire line.
I want you to count to five and pull the handle.
translation.zh: 你数到五后就拉动把手
-你还好吧 兄弟？ -我很害怕

translation.en: In order to be brave, we got to be a little scared.
translation.zh: 为了变得勇敢 我们得先感到害怕 知道吗？

translation.en: All right? Now, I need you to be brave right now. -Can you do that for me? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 我现在需要你变得勇敢 你能为我这么做吗？

translation.en: I want you to hold on to your mom.
Okay, baby. We're gonna sit down.
translation.zh: 好了 宝贝 我们得坐下来

translation.en: We're gonna brace ourselves, all right? Okay.
translation.zh: 我们要注意防撞 知道吗？
跟我一同倒数 宝贝 五
你安全了 跟我们走

translation.en: Just the man I was looking for.
I hear your dad knows everything about this building.
translation.zh: 听说你父亲对这栋大楼很熟悉
我只在乎我的生意伙伴

translation.en: what my business partner is holding behind those doors.
translation.zh: 我只在乎我的生意伙伴 锁在门后的一样东西

translation.en: And you're going to get it for me.
The only way those doors open is from the inside,
or the fire alarm on this floor triggers it,
translation.zh: 或通过这层楼的 火警启动那里的系统

translation.en: but that can't happen because you took the entire system offline.
translation.zh: 但这不可能会发生 因为你已让整套系统离线

translation.en: [Botha] Is that so? Well, let me tell you something.
translation.zh: 是这样吗？ 让我来告诉你一件事

translation.en: Once you know what he loves, you have it.
translation.zh: 你一旦知道他最在乎的是什么 就行了
赵最在乎的就是这栋大楼

translation.en: So now we're going to find out how much you love your family, Will.
translation.zh: 我们现在就来看看 你有多爱你的家人 威尔

translation.en: Listen to me. Opening those doors from this floor can't be done.
translation.zh: 听我说 要从这层楼打开那扇门 是行不通的

translation.en: You're gonna bring Zhao and what he's holding behind those doors to me.
translation.zh: 你必须把赵 还有他隐藏在那扇门后的东西 带到我面前…

translation.en: Or I'm gonna throw your daughter off the fucking roof.
translation.zh: 否则我会把你女儿从屋顶往下扔

translation.en: I hear it's like heaven up there.
-No, no, no! Daddy! No! -No. Georgia! Georgia! No!
[Botha] Straight to the roof, boys. We're not gonna wait around here to burn.
translation.zh: 全都到屋顶去 我们别留在这里等着被烧死

translation.en: [newsman over TV] ...into the destruction of Zhao Long Ji's Pearl tower.
translation.zh: …赵龙基旗下的明珠塔遭到摧毁

translation.en: We're getting reports of activity on the ground floor of the building.
translation.zh: 我们收到情报 大楼底层有新的动静

translation.en: We're going to go live to Kowloon Plaza, where we may have some survivors
translation.zh: 我们直击九龙广场的现场
或许能看到生还者从大楼走出来

translation.en: It's difficult to imagine how anyone could have survived
translation.zh: 很难想象任何人 能在上部楼层的熊熊烈火中

translation.en: the raging fire on the upper floors.
[Henry] My dad's inside. He saved us.
translation.zh: 我爸爸在里头 是他救了我们

translation.en: -He's still inside. -[reporter] Is there any other news?
[newsman] It appears this may be the family of William Sawyer,
translation.zh: 这看似威尔索亚的家人
那名美国籍的安全顾问…

translation.en: There's got to be a way to open these doors.
translation.zh: 一定有办法打开那扇门

translation.en: Where did you put the subroutine panels that controls them?
translation.zh: 你把操作大门的副程序面板放在哪？

translation.en: Where did you hide it, Zhao?

translation.zh: （副程序面板 上线） 在涡轮机的后方？

translation.en: How did you get out of the building? Can you comment?
translation.zh: 你是如何逃出大楼的？ 你是否能回答？

translation.en: [Sergeant Han] And you claim your husband isn't involved?
translation.zh: 你声称自己的丈夫 与这件事没有关联？

translation.en: It's not a claim. He's not involved.
translation.zh: 我不是在声称 他确实没有涉及这件事

translation.en: How many of them did you say you saw?
One in a suit, two others in coveralls.
translation.zh: 一个穿着西装 还有另外两个穿着工作服

translation.en: The one that I spoke to, he had an accent.
translation.zh: 跟我说话的那个有一种口音
好像是斯堪的纳维亚人
身高1米8的白人男性 体型健硕

translation.en: There. Top row. Second from the right.
translation.zh: 就是他 第一排 右边第二个

translation.en: Is this the man you saw?
Has a nasty crew with him, too.
High-end muscle for three different crime syndicates.
translation.zh: 是三组不同犯罪集团所雇佣的 高端暴力执行者

translation.en: This doesn't pass the smell test.

translation.zh: 这不是波塔一贯的行事作风

translation.en: Why would he trap himself in the fire?
translation.zh: 他为何要把自己陷入大火中？

translation.en: And why would he cut off his only way out?
translation.zh: 又为何要把唯一的出口封死？

translation.en: One of them was carrying a container,
translation.zh: 他们其中一人携带着容器

translation.en: and it had a logo with wings on it, and the word "Sirin."
translation.zh: 上面有一个翅膀的徽标 还有“希利恩”的字体

translation.en: A BASE jump from 1,000 meters up gives you roughly
translation.zh: 从1000米的高空执行低空跳伞… 会有粗略2公里的下降距离
会有粗略2公里的下降距离

translation.en: they will land somewhere within this circle.
translation.zh: 他们会在这个区域降落
一个隐秘又广阔的平地上

translation.en: Now, they wouldn't go for Victoria Park. There's too many trees to get hung up on.
translation.zh: 他们不会选择维多利亚公园 那里有太多树木

translation.en: South, they wouldn't clear the peak.
translation.zh: 往南边的话 他们又登不上山顶
往北边… 或许吧 但要经过更长的路程 才能到达广阔的平地

translation.en: but it's a longer haul to an open spot.
translation.zh: 或许吧 但要经过更长的路程 才能到达广阔的平地

translation.en: That's nothing. It's a construction site.
translation.zh: 这里什么也不是 是一个工地

translation.en: You can't seriously be considering this.
For all we know, she could be in on it.
You think I would willingly trap my own children in a burning building?
translation.zh: 你认为我会把自己的孩子 困在着火的大楼内？

translation.en: [in English] I think you could be playing a role.
translation.zh: 我认为你或许只是在扮演一个角色

translation.en: This could all be part of your husband's plan.
translation.zh: 这很有可能是你丈夫计划的一部分

translation.en: If I am wrong and it's empty, then what have you lost?
translation.zh: 我若说错 那里只是一片空地 你又会有什么损失？

translation.en: But if I am right, this might be your only chance
translation.zh: 但万一被我说中… 这或许是你们 能够捉拿幕后策划者的

translation.en: to catch the people responsible for this whole thing.
translation.zh: 这或许是你们 能够捉拿幕后策划者的 唯一机会
我的家人还困在大楼内

translation.en: Just cut the wire, doors will open, climb back up there.
translation.zh: 只需切断电线 大门就会打开 接着再爬回来

translation.en: Does that look like someone with a plan to you?
translation.zh: 那看起来像是一个策划阴谋的人吗？

translation.en: All right, if we're gonna get out of here, you're gonna have to tell me the truth.
translation.zh: 我们若想要逃出这里 你得把真相告诉我

translation.en: How does a man like that call you his business partner?
translation.zh: 那样的人怎么会把你 称为他的生意伙伴？
他的名字是克洛斯波塔

translation.en: He handles extortion for three powerful crime syndicates.
translation.zh: 他替三组势力强大的犯罪集团 处理勒索事件

translation.en: And when I began construction on The Pearl, Botha came to me.
translation.zh: 我刚开始打造明珠塔时 波塔来找过我

translation.en: He said that if I didn't pay him, he'll cripple my labor force
translation.zh: 他威胁我若不付钱 他就会削弱我的劳动力

translation.en: and keep me from ever completing this place.
translation.zh: 让我永远无法搭建好这栋大楼
让我永远无法搭建好这栋大楼 -你于是付了钱给他 -是的

translation.en: But what he didn't know was that I hid tracking software inside my wire transfer.
translation.zh: 但他不知道我在电汇款项时 也把追踪器软件加入其中
当波塔通过他们的离岸帐户 接受我的付款时…
当波塔通过他们的离岸帐户 接受我的付款时… （查询账号…）

translation.en: I was able to trace every transaction,
translation.zh: 我能够追踪每一笔交易…
包括他们的银行账户、姓名以及身份
（下载至外部驱动器…） 这就是我的保险政策

translation.en: Botha would never be able to extort money from me again.
translation.zh: 波塔再也无法对我进行勒索

translation.en: But when the syndicates found out that they were compromised,
translation.zh: 当犯罪集团发现自己受到威胁…

translation.en: they threatened to destroy Botha if he didn't clean up his mess.
translation.zh: （下载完毕） 他们威胁波塔处理好这件事 否则就会摧毁他

translation.en: If he kills me, the copies I've made will be sent to the authorities.
translation.zh: 他要是杀掉我 我制作的副本将被发送至有关当局

translation.en: But if he gets his hands on this, the original,
translation.zh: 但他若能拿到这个正本…

translation.en: he can reverse engineer my tracking software
translation.zh: 就可以通过逆向工程 操控我的跟踪软件

translation.en: and hide the identities before anyone's the wiser.
translation.zh: 在任何人发现这件事之前 隐藏所有人的身份

translation.en: So, he lit this entire building on fire
translation.zh: 所以他特意点燃这整栋大楼

translation.en: knowing that you would take the most valuable thing in this world to you and run.
translation.zh: 因为他知道你一定会带着 你在这世界上最珍贵的东西逃亡

translation.en: -And his plan worked. -Not yet, it hasn't.
translation.zh: -他的计划奏效了 -不 还没有

translation.en: We're gonna give Botha what he came here for.
translation.zh: 我们必须给波塔他想要的

translation.en: As soon as he has the drive, he'll kill us both.
translation.zh: 他一旦拿到驱动器就会杀了我们两人

translation.en: And her life is what matters to me, not mine.
translation.zh: 她的性命比我自己的命还要重要

translation.en: Now, I'm taking that drive to the roof.
translation.zh: 我会把这个驱动器带到屋顶

translation.en: You could either be attached to it or not.
translation.zh: 你可以选择是否要同行

translation.en: I knew you'd find a way.
translation.zh: 我就知道你会找出办法的
还有赵交给我 不 先放开我女儿

translation.en: -I can't let you do this. -Hey, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 我不能让你这么做！ 你在做什么？这不是我们说好的计划

translation.en: -This is not in the plan. -Turn around.
translation.zh: 你在做什么？这不是我们说好的计划 转过身

translation.en: He's got my daughter. Please, don't do this to me.
translation.zh: 我女儿在他手上 请你不要这样对待我！

translation.en: -A parachute or you get nothing! -Give him your parachute.
translation.zh: 不给我降落伞 你什么也得不到！ 把你的降落伞给他

translation.en: [Inspector Wu] It looks like you were right.
We've got armed suspects up ahead.
translation.zh: 前方有携带武器的可疑分子

translation.en: Stay down, don't leave the car.
Thanks. You almost had me convinced out there.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我刚才真的以为你要出卖我

translation.en: You shoot me, I drop this

translation.zh: 我就把这个和女孩扔下去
-快放下武器！ -不要 求求你！

translation.en: But there's one thing you should know first.
translation.zh: 但你得先搞清楚一件事

translation.en: [sighs heavily] I got you. I got you. I got you.
I don't know, she had it on her.
translation.zh: 我不知道 是在她身上找到的

translation.en: It looks like it controls the building.
translation.zh: 好像是用来操控大楼的

translation.en: Hey, let's wait for someone who knows what they're doing.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们不如等 懂得操作这东西的人来到

translation.en: My husband and daughter are in that building,
translation.zh: 我丈夫和女儿还在那栋大楼内

translation.en: it's on fire right now. I'm not gonna wait another damn second.
translation.zh: 大楼着火了 我不会等待片刻

translation.en: Come here. Stay down, stay low. I'm gonna find us a way out of here.
translation.zh: 过来 趴下 我会找到出口的

translation.en: I'm trying to bring the fire systems back online.
translation.zh: 我在尝试恢复防火设施

translation.en: [panting] Daddy's got you. Daddy's got you.
I got you. Look at me. Look at me.
Daddy loves you. Daddy loves you.
translation.zh: -是我 -爸爸爱你 爸爸爱你

translation.en: How the hell did you do that?
I rebooted the control systems for the entire building.
translation.zh: 我重新启动了整栋大楼的控制系统

translation.en: I turned it off and on again.
What are you gonna do now?
You okay? You okay? Are you hurt?
You've got quite a family there.
